alert.note: Alert for Alfalfa; Major; Woods (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 6:55PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Woods, west central Alfalfa, northwestern Major and northeastern Woodward Counties through 745 PM CDT... At 655 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 13 miles west of Alva to 9 miles west of Avard to 3 miles south of Alabaster Caverns State Park. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Alva, Waynoka, Freedom, Dacoma, Alabaster Caverns State Park, Avard, Capron, and Hopeton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
